# Cheatsheets

Quick reference resources for tools related to research software development and bioinformatics.

::: {.callout-tip title="Template for contributing" collapse="true"}

## Name of the tool

**Category:** Type of tool

**About:** One line introduction about the tool

**Links:** [Official cheatsheet](url) | [Official documentation](url) | [Other relevant link](url)

:::

## Apptainer

**Category:** Container platform

**About:** Open-source fork of Singularity, used to package applications with their dependencies for HPC environments

**Links:** [Official documentation](https://apptainer.org/docs/user/latest/) | [Coderefinery tutorial](https://coderefinery.github.io/hpc-containers/)

## Docker

**Category:** Container platform

**About:** Package applications with their dependencies

**Links:** [Official cheatsheet](https://docs.docker.com/get-started/docker_cheatsheet.pdf) | [Official documentation](https://docs.docker.com/)

**Category:** Version control

**About:** Make and manage git repositories for version control of code, documentation, and other projects

**About:** Powerful and fast software environment creator, package manager, and task runner

**Links:** [Official quick start guide](https://pixi.sh/latest/getting_started/) | [Official documentation](https://pixi.sh/latest/)
